迂回奔襲.definition: to attack from an unexpected direction

迂回曲折.definition: meandering and circuitous (idiom); complicated developments that never get anywhere; going around in circles

迂腐.definition: pedantic; trite; inflexible; adherence to old ideas

迂見.definition: absurd opinion; pedantic and unrealistic view

迂訥.definition: overcautious; conservative and dull in conversation

迂論.definition: unrealistic argument; high flown and impractical opinion

迂迴.definition: roundabout route; circuitous; tortuous; to outflank; indirect; roundabout

迂闊.definition: high sounding and impractical; high flown nonsense
